interesting_fact: India is the birthplace of chess and yoga.
Nepal is home to Mount Everest, the tallest mountain in the world.
The Pyramids of Giza are one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.
Australia is home to the Great Barrier Reef, the largest coral reef system in the world.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest tropical rainforest in the world.
The Eiffel Tower was once the tallest man-made structure in the world.
Russia is the largest country in the world by area, covering 11 time zones.
The Great Wall of China is visible from space on rare occasions.
Italy is home to the most UNESCO World Heritage Sites in the world.
Argentina is the birthplace of tango, one of the most influential dances in the world.
Germany is known for its engineering and is the birthplace of the automobile.
Tokyo is the most populous metropolitan area in the world.
